dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 2721 IH: Ukraine Lend-Lease Accountability Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself and Mr. Weber of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act of 2022 to remove certain exclusions provided for under that Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the “Ukraine Lend-Lease Accountability Act”.

section.header: Amendments to Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act of 2022
section.text: Section 2(a) of the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act of 2022 (Public Law 117–118) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3) and (4) as paragraphs (2) and (3), respectively.
